title: Watch the Worlds Final at HOYTS!

replies.body: Viewing parties in OCE are a joke. There isn't one in the CAPITAL of Australia.
people live there?
lel
He does have a point I live in Melbourne I am just happy that they are letting us go.
No Humans live there just Politicians and rabbits
Hey, I totally understand the frustration. The locations are based on where there are cinemas that can take direct satellite feeds. It's something that may be expanded to other cinemas in the future.
:( ikr wish there was one in canberra too, would go across town for it too not even fussed which hoyts it would be at
same with the capital of NZ

Riot aren't going to forget about an entire country and also you get 5 in Australia and we get 2 so you can shut up and boohoo you don't get one in the capital. We didn't get one in our capital so shut your mouth be happy you get more viewing parties than us {{item:3070}}
if youre going off Volume difference in countries.. NZ outways Aus by a fuckload. you get 2 in a tiny ass island  Aus gets 5.. on something 50x the size.. derp
Where did you get 50x from?
Looked at the list of the venues with high hopes, suddenly crushed when there was no ACT rip my ACT buddies
Exactly :(((((((
Fite me
Will there be showbags again at these viewings?
There won't be showbags, but there will be a 3-Day IP boost included with each ticket.
Hey riot. How come there wouldn't be anymore show bags? Because it was great when I saw show bags last year. Please bring back some showbags!
for real? dang, pretty much only reason i could justify the ticket price last time was that sweet bag of loot. I'll just watch it from home and save 20 bucks this time.

There will be some sweet loot going to each venue that the community organisers will be giving away with their activities they will be running. How exactly you will win stuff is up to the individual locations, so reach out to the relevant organiser and see what they have in store!
but what if you bought 4 tickets all from the same email...?
More than likely. You often get to win cool prizes too.
Well most of New Zealanders live in Auckland. 1mil plus.
Seriously, there's no Canberra events ever. I'm not gonna lug me and 2 mates up to sydney ffs. There's a pretty big interest in Canberra too.

While there isn't a Hoyts viewing in Canberra, I have heard of 2 places that are doing viewing parties. One of which is at Reloaded Bar. Can't recall the name of the other. There is still opportunities for you to watch with others!
Hey, see above we have to work with HOYTS with the screens that can access a sat feed so you get the best experience possible, we are hoping to have more screens open next year.
I believe Canberra still has the ANU theatre hosting the games on the big screen like last year.

Looking forward to running the event at Hoyts Norwood! If you're coming to the viewing in SA, be sure to say hi!

Also for those who are asking why they aren't at every Hoyts or why they aren't in specific areas, these Hoyts events use a direct satellite feed so there is no disruptions to the stream that may be caused by internet issues. Unfortunately not all Hoyts locations have the ability to accept satellite feeds.
WTF, WHERE IS CANBERRA!!!{{item:3070}}
Hi, see my responses. This is a choice based on tech only to make sure the feed is 100% solid and of of best quality. We are hoping for more to be open next year.
Cant it be at every hoyts? :/
The HOYTS needs to be able to take a satellite feed to run the broadcast, which is a limited number of cinemas. It may be expanded to other locations in the future.
WTF Where are the pub parties!!! worlds 2014 was amazing at the pub in perth!
If you mean community-run viewing parties they are still happening. This post is just for the HOYTS ones.
oh cool.... any idea where i can find those?
why no loot bags this time :(
Canberra may not have a HOYTS Viewing Location, but you can always watch from home with the memes in Twitch Chat :)
No show bags this year? ðŸ˜­
No sorry.
Why never in NZ Capital either
Hi, we are hoping next year this will change with HOYTS bringing on more sat enabled cinemas.
When does tickets start selling? and can we buy it at the cinemas?
LUL whos going?

Highpoint? :(

That's on the absolute wrong side of Melbourne
Who lives in the west XD
Can we shelf a pinga and sink piss before arriving at our venue of choice? If so I'm there.
{{champion:427}} {{summoner:14}} {{summoner:21}} is op asf
